mapper.insert: INSERT INTO fm_order (member_mail, product_id, product_name, size, color, price, quantity, status) VALUES (#{memberMail}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{size}, #{color}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{status})

INSERT INTO fm_order ( member_mail, product_id, product_name, size, color, price, quantity, status, order_date, used_point, used_coupon_code, is_refunded, image, name, phone, address, discount, delcharges, totalprice, paymethod, payment, coupon_discount ) VALUES ( #{memberMail}, #{productId}, #{productName}, #{size}, #{color}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{status}, NOW(), #{usedPoint}, #{usedCouponCode}, #{isRefunded}, #{image}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{discount}, #{delcharges}, #{totalprice}, #{paymethod}, #{payment}, #{couponDiscount} )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM fm_order WHERE member_mail = #{memberMail} ORDER BY order_date DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT o.order_id, -- ✅ 이 필드 포함 o.memberMail, o.productId, o.productName, o.size, o.color, o.price, o.quantity, o.status, o.order_date, o.usedPoint, o.usedCouponCode, o.image, o.refunded o.name FROM fm_order o WHERE o.memberMail = #{memberMail}
